Dialogue.Page: I'm Bonford, and yeah, I know, One of my kind, all the way out here, stranded.

DialogueOption.Text: My name's Hatchling. How did you get here?

Dialogue.Page: Well, it's a long story. You may not believe me, but Feldspar was not the first pilot for Outer Wilds Ventures. I was.

DialogueOption.Text: I'm sorry what? How is that possible?

Dialogue.Page: Turns out, I was selected as a pilot. But when my engines failed, I was sent spiraling out into the cold darkness of space. Luckily, I was moving very fast, so I was able to get to those systems off into the distance.

DialogueOption.Text: What systems? You mean the ones with the blue, red, orange and yellow, black hole and dim red stars?

Dialogue.Page: Yup, that's the one. If you pull out your signalscope out and put it on Quantum Fluctuations, you'll be able to hear the faint cries of that weird LEAN planet.

DialogueOption.Text: That is oddly horrifying... Uh, so what brought you here?

Dialogue.Page: Well whilst I was on this one planet, I think you'll know it by the name of Wher, I cut down some trees and fixed my engines. From there, I journeyed back into the void to try and get back home. Unfortunately, this led me here. And I'm out of fuel.

DialogueOption.Text: Oh my- I am so sorry for you.

Dialogue.Page: No need to be. I've been here for a while, and though the solitude started to drive me kerbonkers, you showed up. Say, you got a ship on ya?

DialogueOption.Text: Yeah, what about it? Need to go home?

Dialogue.Page: No. I don't want to go home anymore. Using my signalscope, I picked up some strong quantum signals from a blank patch in space. Happen to know what that could be?

DialogueOption.Text: Maybe. I think it may be an object the Nomai discovered called the Eye of the Universe.

Well considered you were the first pilot, I expected this. Supposedly, the Eye is a mysterious quantum object an ancient species called the Nomai have been looking for. For ages. But they ended up dying, and never found it.

Dialogue.Page: Do you happen to know how to get to it?

DialogueOption.Text: I warped here in an ancient Nomai spaceship called the Vessel. I can use it again to get to the Eye, since I have the coordinates.

Dialogue.Page: Well if you say the Nomai were looking for it for a long time, that must mean it's important. You should go!

DialogueOption.Text: Yeah, no worries. I'm still figuring out how to get there myself.
